column4: What is a good backup / recovery solution for Ubuntu?  I have a LAMP server running and I need to make sure the box can be restored and up and running in the event of system failure.
for an important server I would go with something that backups the entire server.. so you just restore a disk image or similar and start again
yeah... I like clonezilla... but that requires me to take the machine offline
oh.. that's not really good.. there isn't a way to do it while it's online?
